DOC.criteria: Age great 18 year , upper age limit Patients stable coronary artery disease ( II III class accord Canadian Cardiovascular Society ) hospitalize coronarography lower extremity arterial disease hospitalize angiography Written inform consent Pregnancy Age less 18 year eGFR < 30 ml/min/1,73 m2 Simultaneous participation clinical trial Coexisting pathology upperlimbs limit use cuff ( bilateral amputee , recent trauma , chronic ulcer , significant upper limb peripheral atherosclerosis ( radial pulse palpable either side ) ) Malignant tumor ( remission le 5 year ongoing treatment ) Documented allergic reaction iodinate contrast agent Acute infection ( body temperature 38 degree Celsius high , c reactive protein 50mg/L high ) Cardiac rhythm abnormality ( atrial fibrillation , frequent supraventricular premature complex ) Documented myocardial infarction within 30 day Inability understand instruction study Vascular surgery axillary region Unable lie supine 40 minute Home oxygen treatment Documented upper limb deep vein thrombosis
